content.html:
Not sure exactly how this is working, but g_playAct is being added to "playToolbars" twice, one in MainWindow.cc and one in TimePanel.cc. Maybe one of them should be removed?

$ grep -r "playToolbar"
gui/TimePanel.cc:  QToolBar *playToolbar = new QToolBar;
gui/TimePanel.cc:  playToolbar->setObjectName("playToolBar");
gui/TimePanel.cc:  playToolbar->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
gui/TimePanel.cc:    playToolbar->addAction(g_playAct);
gui/TimePanel.cc:    playToolbar->addAction(g_pauseAct);
gui/TimePanel.cc:  playToolbar->addWidget(emptyLabel);
gui/TimePanel.cc:    playToolbar->addAction(g_stepAct);
gui/TimePanel.cc:  this->stepToolBarLabelAction = playToolbar->addWidget(stepToolBarLabel);
gui/TimePanel.cc:  this->stepButtonAction = playToolbar->addWidget(this->stepButton);
gui/TimePanel.cc:  frameLayout->addWidget(playToolbar);
gui/MainWindow.cc:  this->playToolbar = this->addToolBar(tr("Play"));
gui/MainWindow.cc:  this->playToolbar->addAction(g_playAct);
gui/MainWindow.cc:  this->playToolbar->addAction(g_pauseAct);
gui/MainWindow.cc:  this->playToolbar->addAction(g_stepAct);
gui/MainWindow.hh:      private: QToolBar *playToolbar;
